page.title: 17FOOD
page.content:
At school dinner time we have the oldest setting the tables and serving us.One of the favourite dinners are roast dinner and milkshake Here is one of our typical menues. { {Monday}fish cakes mashed potato peas majorica slice {Tuesday}steak and kidney pie roast potato carrots gravy fruit or milkshake {Wednesday}cheese+potato pie s.r. potatoes tomatoes yogert {Thursday}ham salad chipe or bread jam and cream dougnuts {Friday}chicken casserole mashed pots veg apple cake
Most people have dinners but some have sandwiches .
